name: deepgram-transcription-worker
description: GCF for transcribing audio using Deepgram API

scripts.gcp-deploy: gcloud functions deploy deepgramTranscriptionWorker --gen2 --runtime nodejs18 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region YOUR_REGION --source . --entry-point deepgramTranscriptionWorker --set-env-vars DEEPGRAM_API_KEY=YOUR_DEEPGRAM_KEY
